scripts.install: (cd frontend && npm install) && (cd ../) && (cd backend && dep ensure)
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && cross-env PORT=3000 npm start" "cd backend && go run demspirals.go"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend && go build "
scripts.package: (mkdir package) && (cd package && mkdir cache && mkdir config) && (cd ../) && (cp -r frontend/build backend/demspirals* package/)
